description.value:
Passage aboard a Void Craft, to another planet or star system. A Quick up to or down from orbit along with a reasonable selection of cargo. No need for Berthing.

Requirements

Most well developed planets have easily locatable docks with indicated destinations and rates. For a specific location or more questionable cargo, more negotiation might be needed

Effect: Average

Notes: 350 T
